title: STK operates locations across multiple countries
statement: STK Steakhouse has restaurant locations in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Qatar, United Arab Emirates, England, and Italy.

citations.quote: Arizona Scottsdale, California Los Angeles San Diego San Francisco Topanga, Colorado Denver... Ontario Niagara Fallsview Toronto, Qatar Doha, United Arab Emirates Dubai, England London – Stratford London – Strand, Italy Milan
